data.message: Great that it is coming to Northampton, not so great that you don't make any sort of provision for kids or adults with special needs though. Found this out a couple of years ago when the truck visited Oxford.

replies.message:
Apoarently they are tbis year..
Its going to be parked the whole time across a couple of disabled parking bays....
Not funny and not called for Karl,
They were very accommodating to my husband and his wheel chair at Dreamland Margate last year. The choir also sung happy birthday to my son xx
Hopefully they have progressed from their attitude a couple of years ago Sharon, when I was told no allowances were made for disabilities at all.  Glad they they helped you though, xxxx

Perhaps i may of missed the whole point but a lorry drives from place to place parks up and people take pictures alongside it....
If there's more to the lorry turning up and taking pictures by it, i take it all back and apologies.. 
It wasn't meant to be funny.. but by the sounds of it more of not understanding what allowances are needed to take photos of the lorry....
